statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Rashun Davis hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer to give Radford a 92-91 double-overtime victory over Howard on Saturday.
article.headline: Davis' 3-pointer gives Radford 92-91 win over Howard in 2OT
article.linkText: Davis' 3-pointer gives Radford 92-91 win over Howard in 2OT
article.story: WASHINGTON -- Rashun Davis hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer to give Radford a 92-91 double-overtime victory over Howard on Saturday. Davis made a 3-pointer with 1.5 seconds left in double overtime to beat Georgetown in Washington on Nov. 14. James Daniel, the nation's leading scorer who had 38 points, hit a bank shot with six seconds left for Howard (6-5), which was without three injured starters but got Daniel back after he missed a loss to Purdue. Davis, who finished with 23 points, missed a shot at the end of regulation and Howard missed two shots as the first overtime ended. Radford (6-5) led by nine at halftime. Radford freshman Ed Polite Jr. had his best game with 27 points and 11 rebounds. Marcel Boyd had 17 rebounds with 15 points for Howard. Radford coach Mike Jones, a former Howard player and assistant, returned to his alma mater for the first time as a head coach.
